item.title: Safeguarding Tomorrow: The Critical Role of AI Safety
Project Contribution Work Periods
item.description: Project Board All issues can be found here. These issues can be done individually or collaboratively at any time! In-Person Sessions In-person sessions will be centered around collaboration and guiding students through their first contributions towards new and existing CCSS projects. Getting Asynchronous Help If you cannot make it to our in-person sessions but still need help, you can send a message in our Discord server!

item.title: CS & Society: Challenges and Opportunities for Tech Workers - AI Down the Line
item.description: The tech industry, accustomed to disrupting traditional businesses, is undergoing unforeseen shifts in 2022-2023, with slowed growth and a newfound emphasis on profitability. Despite numerous open IT positions, concerns loom over the impact on tech careers. The introduction of Generative AI, including tools like Copilot and DALLE2, has amplified the potential for substantial work automation, reshaping the industry’s landscape. Industry veteran Dave Thomas, drawing from five decades of experience, explores the implications of these disruptive changes in his talk.
